footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Dori | Update Date: 09/21/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Forest Regalia, Sacrificial Greatsword, Wolf’s Gravestone, Bloodtainted Greatsword, Rainslasher

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or Elemental Mastery or HP% |<goblet> HP% or Elemental Mastery |<circlet> HP% or Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Alcazarzaray's Exactitude
Elemental Skill and Normal Attacks are not needed for a Healer or Support build.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
The Bell has an HP% substat, but will generally fall behind from how much Energy Recharge Dori needs.
The Ocean-Hued Clam can work on Dori if she has a lot of investment into her healing.
